about.content: TechCare provides complete computer repair and IT support for homes and small businesses. Our certified technicians handle everything from simple fixes to complex network issues. Fast, reliable service with honest pricing.

products.name: Hardware Upgrade

products.name: Data Recovery
products.description: Recover deleted files or data from failed drives. Emergency service available. Success-based pricing.

products.name: Business IT Support
products.description: Per hour IT support for small businesses. Network setup, troubleshooting, and maintenance.

products.description: Fix many issues remotely without leaving home. Fast and convenient. Same-day availability.
